intents.description: Fix AI takeDamage bug - AI should accept damage automatically in respondToBang stage

Implement character selection UI phase - show players 2 random characters to choose from
Fix gameFlow integration test - complete character selection in beforeEach
Fix server port conflict with auto-port selection and set up CI/CD pipeline
Investigate and fix 2 flaky unit tests in moves.test.ts
